reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress elegant, well-made, and comfortable, with one noting the tulle material doesn't scratch or itch. The dress is flattering, particularly for fuller figures, and customers consider it good value for money. While some it's true to size, others report it's not true to size, and opinions about the length are mixed, with some finding it good while others say it's too short. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The dress is beautiful, it is perfect and the fabric feels of excellent
items.body: I'm delighted with this party dress. The material is soft, comfortable and feels very good quality. The design is elegant and modern, it fits flatteringly without feeling tight. The color is vibrant and the cut enhances the figure. I used it for a special occasion and everyone asked me where I bought it. It is definitely a dress that makes you feel confident, feminine and elegant. I would buy it again. Read more
items.author: Susana Báez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good dress for the price - Looks nice - Order larger than you need - runs a bit small.
items.body: Great dress for attending a wedding. I followed the other reviews and ordered larger than I normally wood. Good thing that I did, by ordering up a size the dress fit me well. I don't know how well it will hold up, but it was a good buy for the wedding. I looked great and had fun. The dress was light enough that I did not overheat. The Wedding was the end of August in the North East - outside. Reception was inside - I felt comfortable the whole time. I'm a bigger girl so it was nice to have sleeves that covered the tops of my arms without being heavy and tight. Read more
items.author: Samantha

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but Pay Attention
items.body: The dress is pretty, made well and fits the to size. However, if you’re buying black, note that the embellishments are all black. They are not silver and black as shown in image. It’s just the lighting that makes it appear silver. Read more
items.author: Shelby

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: This dress was perfect for my son's wedding. It was very comfortable and fit perfectly. I typically wear a size 18 dress and bought size XXL. Read more
items.author: Shelly G

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress!
items.body: This is a beautiful dress. I can’t count the compliments I’ve received. It runs true to size for me. I ordered up and it was a little big but comfortable. I’m 200lbs 5’3 and it was a little long but with heels it just tipped the floor so that I wasn’t walking on it. I wore this for my son’s wedding. It is light weight. The fabric has a nice amount of stretch. I loved the cut it was modest not showing too much. Read more
items.author: Margaret A.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very beautiful dress
items.body: I love this dress, very accommodating to my size beautifully made, and elegant Read more
items.author: Tablet

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Like it!
items.body: While I really like this dress, every time I zip it up, I'm afraid the zipper is going to break. Also the design on the sleeves is a little scratchy. Other than that its a very nice dress. Read more
items.author: Kirsten Triplett

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dress was just gorgeous on!
items.body: This dress made me feel like a goddess! It came out of the pack in great shape and I barely had to steam it. The embroidery and stitching seemed very well made. It was not see thru which I really appreciated. I am 5'11" and it went to my ankles Read more
items.author: Rae Cole

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black-sequin, Gold-regular, Green-sequin, White-sequin, Navy-sequin, Haze Blue-sequin, Burgundy-sequin, Gold-sequin, Lavender-sequin. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
